pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.entry: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Overgrow | Hidden: Chlorophyll

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.entry: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Overgrow | Hidden: Chlorophyll

pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.entry: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Overgrow | Hidden: Chlorophyll

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.entry: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Blaze | Hidden: Solar Power

pokemon.name: Charmeleon
pokemon.entry: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Blaze | Hidden: Solar Power

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.entry: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Blaze | Hidden: Solar Power

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.entry: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Torrent | Hidden: Rain Dish

pokemon.name: Wartortle
pokemon.entry: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Torrent | Hidden: Rain Dish

pokemon.name: Blastoise
pokemon.entry: A brutal Pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Torrent | Hidden: Rain Dish

pokemon.name: Caterpie
pokemon.entry: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Shield Dust | Hidden: Run Away

pokemon.name: Metapod
pokemon.entry: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Shed Skin.

pokemon.name: Butterfree
pokemon.entry: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Compound Eyes | Hidden: Tinted Lens

pokemon.name: Weedle
pokemon.entry: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Shield Dust | Hidden: Run Away

pokemon.name: Kakuna
pokemon.entry: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.
pokemon.abilities: Main:Shed Skin

pokemon.name: Beedrill
pokemon.entry: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Swarm | Hidden: Sniper

pokemon.name: Pidgey
pokemon.entry: common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Keen Eye, Tangled Feet | Hidden: Big Pecks

pokemon.name: Pidgeotto
pokemon.entry: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Keen Eye, Tangled Feet | Hidden: Big Pecks

pokemon.name: Pidgeot
pokemon.entry: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Keen Eye, Tangled Feet | Hidden: Big Pecks

pokemon.name: Rattata
pokemon.entry: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
pokemon.abilities: Main:Ruy Away, Guts | Hidden: Hustle

pokemon.name: Raticate
pokemon.entry: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
pokemon.abilities: Main:Ruy Away, Guts | Hidden: Hustle

pokemon.name: Spearow
pokemon.entry: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
pokemon.abilities: Main:Ruy Away, Guts | Hidden: Hustle

pokemon.name: Fearow
pokemon.entry: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
pokemon.abilities: Main:. Hidden:

pokemon.name: Ekans
pokemon.entry: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole
pokemon.abilities: Main: Intimidate, Shed Skin | Hidden: Unnerve

pokemon.name: Arbok
pokemon.entry: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Intimidate, Shed Skin | Hidden: Unnerve

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.entry: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Static |  Hidden: Lightning

pokemon.name: Raichu
pokemon.entry: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Static |  Hidden: Lightning

pokemon.name: Sandshrew
pokemon.entry: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Sand Veil |  Hidden: Sand Rush

pokemon.name: Sandslash
pokemon.entry: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Sand Veil |  Hidden: Sand Rush

pokemon.name: Nidoran 	♀
pokemon.entry: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Poison Point, Rivalry | Hidden: Hustle

pokemon.name: Nidorina
pokemon.entry: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Poison Point, Rivalry | Hidden: Hustle

pokemon.name: Nidoqueen
pokemon.entry: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Poison Point, Rivalry | Hidden: Sheer Force

pokemon.name: Nidoran 	♂
pokemon.entry: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Poison Point, Rivalry | Hidden: Hustle

pokemon.name: Nidorino
pokemon.entry: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Poison Point, Rivalry | Hidden: Hustle

pokemon.name: Nidoking
pokemon.entry: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Poison Point, Rivalry | Hidden: Sheer Force

pokemon.name: Clefairy
pokemon.entry: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Cute Charm, Magic Guard | Hidden: Friend Guard

pokemon.name: Clefable
pokemon.entry: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Cute Charm, Magic Guard | Hidden: Unaware

pokemon.name: Vulpix
pokemon.entry: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Flash Fire | Hidden: Drought

pokemon.name: Ninetales
pokemon.entry: ery smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Flash Fire | Hidden: Drought

pokemon.name: Jigglypuff
pokemon.entry: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Cute Charm, Competitive | Hidden: Friend Guard

pokemon.name: Wigglytuff
pokemon.entry: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Cute Charm, Competitive | Hidden: Frisk

pokemon.name: Zubat
pokemon.entry: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Inner Focus | Hidden: Infiltrator

pokemon.name: Golbat
pokemon.entry: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Inner Focus | Hidden: Infiltrator

pokemon.name: Oddish
pokemon.entry: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Chlorophyll | Hidden: Run Away

pokemon.name: Gloom
pokemon.entry: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Chlorophyll | Hidden: Stench

pokemon.name: Vileplume
pokemon.entry: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Chlorophyll | Hidden: Effect Spore

pokemon.name: Paras
pokemon.entry: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Effect Spore, Dry Skin | Hidden: Damp

pokemon.name: Parasect
pokemon.entry: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Effect Spore, Dry Skin | Hidden: Damp

pokemon.name: Venonat
pokemon.entry: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Compound Eyes, Tinted Lens | Hidden: Run Away

pokemon.name: Venomoth
pokemon.entry: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Shield Dust, Tinted Lens | Hidden: Wonder Skin

pokemon.name: Diglett
pokemon.entry: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Sand Veil, Arena Trap | Hidden: Sand Force

pokemon.name: Dugtrio
pokemon.entry: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Sand Veil, Arena Trap | Hidden: Sand Force

pokemon.name: Meowth
pokemon.entry: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Pickup, Technician | Hidden: Unnerve

pokemon.name: Persian
pokemon.entry: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Limber, Technician | Hidden: Unnerve

pokemon.name: Psyduck
pokemon.entry: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily Pokémon will use psychokinetic powers.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Damp, Cloud Nine | Hideen: Swift Swim

pokemon.name: Golduck
pokemon.entry: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Damp, Cloud Nine | Hideen: Swift Swim

pokemon.name: Mankey
pokemon.entry: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Vital Spirit, Anger Point | Hidden: Defiant

pokemon.name: Primeape
pokemon.entry: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Vital Spirit, Anger Point | Hidden: Defiant

pokemon.name: Growlithe
pokemon.entry: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Intimidate, Flash Fire | Hidden: Justified

pokemon.name: Arcanine
pokemon.entry: A Pokémon that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Intimidate, Flash Fire | Hidden: Justified

pokemon.name: Poliwag
pokemon.entry: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Water Absorb, Damp | Hidden: Swift Swim

pokemon.name: Poliwhirl
pokemon.entry: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Water Absorb, Damp | Hidden: Swift Swim

pokemon.name: Poliwrath
pokemon.entry: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Water Absorb, Damp | Hidden: Swift Swim

pokemon.name: Abra
pokemon.entry: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and Teleport to safety.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Synchronize, Inner Focus | Hidden: Magic Gaurd

pokemon.name: Kadabra
pokemon.entry: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Synchronize, Inner Focus | Hidden: Magic Gaurd

pokemon.name: Alakazam
pokemon.entry: Its brain can outperform a super-computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Synchronize, Inner Focus | Hidden: Magic Gaurd

pokemon.name: Machop
pokemon.entry: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Guts, No Guard | Hidden: Steadfast

pokemon.name: Machoke
pokemon.entry: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Guts, No Guard | Hidden: Steadfast

pokemon.name: Machamp
pokemon.entry: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Guts, No Guard | Hidden: Steadfast

pokemon.name: Bellsprout
pokemon.entry: A carnivorous Pokémon that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Chlorophyll | Hidden: Gluttony

pokemon.name: Weepinbell
pokemon.entry: It spits out PoisonPowder to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of Acid.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Chlorophyll | Hidden: Gluttony

pokemon.name: Victreebel
pokemon.entry: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Chlorophyll | Hidden: Gluttony

pokemon.name: Tentacool
pokemon.entry: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Clear Body, Liquid Ooze | Hidden: Rain Dish

pokemon.name: Tentacruel
pokemon.entry: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Clear Body, Liquid Ooze | Hidden: Rain Dish

pokemon.name: Geodude
pokemon.entry: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Rock Head, Sturdy | Hidden: Sand Veil

pokemon.name: Graveler
pokemon.entry: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Rock Head, Sturdy | Hidden: Sand Veil

pokemon.name: Golem
pokemon.entry: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Rock Head, Sturdy | Hidden: Sand Veil

pokemon.name: Ponyta
pokemon.entry: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Run Away, Flash Fire | HIdden: Flame Body

pokemon.name: Rapidash
pokemon.entry: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Run Away, Flash Fire | HIdden: Flame Body

pokemon.name: Slowpoke
pokemon.entry: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Oblivious, Own Tempo | Hidden: Regenerator

pokemon.name: Slowbro
pokemon.entry: The Shellder that is latched onto Slowpoke's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Oblivious, Own Tempo | Hidden: Regenerator

pokemon.name: Magnemite
pokemon.entry: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses Thunder Wave and similar moves.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Magnet Pull, Sturdy | Hidden: Analytic

pokemon.name: Magneton
pokemon.entry: Formed by several Magnemites linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Magnet Pull, Sturdy | Hidden: Analytic

pokemon.name: Farfetch'd
pokemon.entry: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Keen Eye, Inner Focus | Hidden: Defiant

pokemon.name: Doduo
pokemon.entry: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Run Away, Early Bird | Hidden: Tangled Feet

pokemon.name: Dodrio
pokemon.entry: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Run Away, Early Bird | Hidden: Tangled Feet

pokemon.name: Seel
pokemon.entry: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Thick Fat, Hydration | Hidden: Ice Body

pokemon.name: Dewgong
pokemon.entry: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Thick Fat, Hydration | Hidden: Ice Body

pokemon.name: Grimer
pokemon.entry: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Stench, Sticky Hold | Hidden: Poison Touch

pokemon.name: Muk
pokemon.entry: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Stench, Sticky Hold | Hidden: Poison Touch

pokemon.name: Shellder
pokemon.entry: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Shell Armor, Skill Link | Hidden: Overcoat

pokemon.name: Cloyster
pokemon.entry: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Shell Armor, Skill Link | Hidden: Overcoat

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.entry: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Levitate

pokemon.name: Haunter
pokemon.entry: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Levitae

pokemon.name: Gengar
pokemon.entry: Under a full moon, this Pokémon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Cursed Body

pokemon.name: Onix
pokemon.entry: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Rock Head, Sturdy | Hidden: Weak Armor

pokemon.name: Drowzee
pokemon.entry: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Insomnia, Forewarn | Hidden: Inner Focus

pokemon.name: Hypno
pokemon.entry: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Insomnia, Forewarn | Hidden: Inner Focus

pokemon.name: Drowzee
pokemon.entry: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Insomnia, Forewarn | Hidden: Inner Focus

pokemon.name: Hypno
pokemon.entry: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Insomnia, Forewarn | Hidden: Inner Focus

pokemon.name: Voltorb
pokemon.entry: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poké Ball, they have zapped many people.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Soundproof, Static | Hidden: Aftermath

pokemon.name: Electrode
pokemon.entry: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Soundproof, Static | Hidden: Aftermath

pokemon.name: Exeggcute
pokemon.entry: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Chlorophyl | Hidden: Harvest

pokemon.name: Exeggutor
pokemon.entry: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an Exeggcute.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Choorophyl | Hidden: Frisk

pokemon.name: Cubone
pokemon.entry: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this Pokémon's real face.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Rock Head, Lightning Rod | Hidden: Battle Armor

pokemon.name: Marowak
pokemon.entry: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Rock Head, Lightning Rod | Hidden: Battle Armor

pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
pokemon.entry: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Limber, Reckless | Hidden: Unburden

pokemon.name: Hitmonchan
pokemon.entry: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Keen Eye, Iron Fist | Hidden: Inner Focus

pokemon.name: Lickitung
pokemon.entry: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Own Tempo, Obvious | Hidden: Cloud Nine

pokemon.name: Koffing
pokemon.entry: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Levitate, Neutralizing Gas | Hidden: Stench

pokemon.name: Weezing
pokemon.entry: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 Koffings can fuse into a Weezing over many years.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Levitate, Neutralizing Gas | Hidden: Stench

pokemon.name: Rhyhorn
pokemon.entry: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Lightning Rod, Rock Head Hidden: Reckless

pokemon.name: Rhydon
pokemon.entry: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Lightning Rod, Rock Head Hidden: Reckless

pokemon.name: Chansey
pokemon.entry: A rare and elusive Pokémon that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Natural Cure, Serene Grace | Hidden: Healer

pokemon.name: Tangela
pokemon.entry: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. Its vines shake as it walks.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Chlorophyll, Leaf Guard | Hidden: Regenerator

pokemon.name: Kangaskhan
pokemon.entry: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Early Bird, Scrappy | Hidden: Inner Focus

pokemon.name: Horsea
pokemon.entry: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Swift Swim, Sniper | Hidden: Damp

pokemon.name: Seadra
pokemon.entry: Capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Poison Point, Sniper | Hidden: Damp

pokemon.name: Goldeen
pokemon.entry: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Swift Swim, Water Veil | Hidden: Lightning Rod

pokemon.name: Seaking
pokemon.entry: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Swift Swim, Water Veil | Hidden: Lightning Rod

pokemon.name: Staryu
pokemon.entry: An enigmatic Pokémon that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Illuminate, Natural Cure | Hidden: Analytic

pokemon.name: Starmie
pokemon.entry: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Illuminate, Natural Cure | Hidden: Analytic

pokemon.name: Mr.Mime
pokemon.entry: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Soundproof, Filter | Hidden: Technician

pokemon.name: Scyther
pokemon.entry: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Swarm, Technician | Hidden: Steadfast

pokemon.name: Jynx
pokemon.entry: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Oblivious, Forewarn | Hidden: Dry Skin

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.entry: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Static | Hidden: Vital Spirit

pokemon.name: Magmar
pokemon.entry: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Flame Body | Hidden: Vital Spirit

pokemon.name: Pinsir
pokemon.entry: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Hyper Cutter, Mold Breaker | Hidden: Moxie

pokemon.name: Tauros
pokemon.entry: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Intimidate, Anger Point | Hidden: Sheer Force

pokemon.name: Magikarp
pokemon.entry: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Swift Swim | Hidden: Rattled

pokemon.name: Gyarados
pokemon.entry: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Intimidate | Hidden: Moxie

pokemon.name: Lapras
pokemon.entry: A Pokémon that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Water Absorb, Shell Armor | Hidden: Hydration

pokemon.name: Ditto
pokemon.entry: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Limber | Hidden: Imposter

pokemon.name: Eevee
pokemon.entry: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from Evolution stones.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Run Away, Adaptability | Hidden: Anticipation

pokemon.name: Vaporeon
pokemon.entry: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Water Absorb | Hidden: Hydration

pokemon.name: Jolteon
pokemon.entry: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000-volt lightning bolts.
pokemon.abilities: Main: Volt Absorb | Hidden: Quick Feet

pokemon.name: Flareon
